name: PS-13. Fermat`s Spiral Delaunay Voronoi 3-4
description:
v4W.ENko - "PS-13. Fermat`s Spiral Delaunay Voronoi 3-4". The Fermat`s Spiral algorithm is used to rotate points around the center of the image. This is continuation of the "Pattern Standardization" series which shows the usual "Fermat`s Spiral" approach. Grey rectangles are linked to the points of "Fermat`s Spiral" algorithm. The white lines are generated with "Delaunay triangulation" and are connecting the "Fermat`s Spiral" control points. Dark gray "Voronoi diagram" cells are added to the points. 
The transformation of the points according to the "Fermat`s Spiral" approach generates the transition from triangular to rectangular form
Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames.
